name: Ancestor Worship
description:
Done for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam. The theme was "present".  This serves as a writing piece showing how we are the products of the choices our ancestors made, and not simply products of our own choices i.e. choices in the past impact our present. 

It aims to poke fun at both our ancestors and people possibly taking their own ancestors too seriously.

Initially, the project was meant to be developed in Unity to allow for player choices to  visually effect the player and ancestor sprites. e.g. an ancestor losing an arm would make the player lose an arm.  Due to time constraints, it was scaled down to a Twine project which would show how the choices would add up and impact the descendant.
